value.desc: Any number to indicate the given value of the knob. Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use the v-model directive

min.desc: The minimum value that the model (the knob value) should start at

max.desc: The maximimum value that the model (the knob value) should go to

step.desc: A number representing steps in the value of the model, while adjusting the knob

track-color.desc: The color of the knob's track

center-color.desc: The color of the area within the knob's track

thickness.desc: A number between 0 and 1 determining the thickness of the knob's ring

angle.desc: An offset angle, which will rotate the knob

show-value.desc: Allows the knob to display its model value. Also allows any default slot content to be rendered
